name: Fireball
purpose: To create a ball of fire for offensive magic

name: Teleportation
purpose: To instantly transport to a different location

name: Healing Light
purpose: To heal wounds and injuries with light magic

name: Frost Nova
purpose: To freeze and slow down enemies

name: Shadowmeld
purpose: To become nearly invisible in shadows

name: Elemental Fury
purpose: To harness the power of the elements for offense
materials: Fire Essence, Water Droplet, Air Feather, Earth Crystal

name: Mind Control
purpose: To temporarily influence the thoughts of others
materials: Enchanted Amethyst, Mindbender Root, Illusion Dust

name: Lightning Strike
purpose: To summon a powerful bolt of lightning

name: Illusionary Mirror
purpose: To create a decoy of the caster

name: Gravity Well
purpose: To create a localized area of increased gravity
materials: Black Hole Crystal, Graviton Particle, Stardust

name: Soul Bind
purpose: To link the caster's life force with a target

name: Time Stop
purpose: To momentarily halt the flow of time
materials: Temporal Crystal, Chrono Dust, Hourglass Sand

name: Barrier Ward
purpose: To create a protective energy barrier
materials: Warding Glyph, Essence of Shielding, Guardian Stone

name: Enchanted Beacon
purpose: To emit a powerful guiding light
